H0.text: At which English racecourse would you see the 'Hennessy Gold Cup'. Cheltenham

H1.text: At which English racecourse would you see the 'Hennessy Gold Cup'. Aintree

H2.text: At which English racecourse would you see the 'Hennessy Gold Cup'. Ascot

H3.text: At which English racecourse would you see the 'Hennessy Gold Cup'. Newbury

A4.text: It was transferred to Newbury in 1960

A5.text: The event was established in 1957 as the Hennessy Cognac Gold Cup, and it was initially staged at Cheltenham

A6.text: Sir Peter O'Sullevan's last broadcast commentary took place in November 1997 at Newbury, on the Hennessey Gold Cup, won by Suny Bay.

A7.text: The Coral Gold Cup (formerly known as the Hennessy Gold Cup)
